kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Get Elements Texts
kw.doc: Returns text of all elements matching ``xpath`` as a list.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get Substring
kw.doc: Returns a substring from ``start`` index to ``end`` index.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${content_text} = Get high-speed satellite internet wherever you live

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Get high-speed satellite internet wherever you live
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Get Elements Texts
kw.doc: Returns text of all elements matching ``xpath`` as a list.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get Substring
kw.doc: Returns a substring from ``start`` index to ``end`` index.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${content_text} = Get high-speed satellite internet wherever you live

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Get high-speed satellite internet wherever you live
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Parse Xml
kw.doc: Parses the given XML file or string into an element structure.

kw.name: Get Elements Texts
kw.doc: Returns text of all elements matching ``xpath`` as a list.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Get Substring
kw.doc: Returns a substring from ``start`` index to ``end`` index.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: ${content_text} = Get high-speed satellite internet wherever you live

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.arg: Get high-speed satellite internet wherever you live
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
